mapper.select: select id, uid, name, phone, id_number, car_store_id, car_store_name, car_sn, number_plate, car_deposit, status, create_time from electricity.t_rent_car_order where id = #{id}
select id, uid, name, phone, id_number, car_store_id, car_store_name, car_sn, number_plate, car_deposit, status, create_time from electricity.t_rent_car_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into electricity.t_rent_car_order(uid, name, phone, id_number, car_store_id, car_store_name, car_sn, number_plate, car_deposit, status, create_time) values (#{uid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{idNumber}, #{carStoreId}, #{carStoreName}, #{carSn}, #{numberPlate}, #{carDeposit}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_rent_car_order
uid = #{uid},
name = #{name},
phone = #{phone},
id_number = #{idNumber},
car_store_id = #{carStoreId},
car_store_name = #{carStoreName},
car_sn = #{carSn},
number_plate = #{numberPlate},
car_deposit = #{carDeposit},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
